name: Assemble AI
description: Assemble’s AI agent, News3(NS3), was developed with the goal of revolutionizing Web 3.0 journalism. NS3 delivers crypto and global economic trends quickly and clearly, and leverages advanced AI reasoning capabilities to analyze these trends, enabling market participants to make data-driven decisions. In particular, NS3 utilizes OpenAI’s latest reasoning model as its core engine to analyze crypto and economic trends, providing a range of insights including market psychology, past case analysis, future predictions, ripple effects, and investment strategies in 12 languages.
